name: Minority Programmers Association
description: The Minority Programmers Association is an international network of developers unifying together to tackle humanitarian issues with software solutions. We are a professional network, a community of mentor and students, a place to learn relevant IT skills with job placement, a hub for innovation, but most importantly, a family..
